extendedInfo.description: A free working holiday to Bermuda seems too good an opportunity for part-time cleaner Lisa to resist. However, her employer, Sir Ralph Higgins, an international banker, gets duped into smuggling drugs and is arrested at Bermuda International Airport. Lisa's troubles are only just beginning and it isnât turning out to be the sunshine holiday she thought it would be. Along with Sir Ralphâs wife and other members of his household staff, Lisa has to outwit a corrupt chief of police and his criminal associates. Their course of amateur detection leads them through a series of dangerous adventures on the island, putting their lives at risk, and it results in their becoming victims of the curse of the Bermuda Triangle. Surely things couldn't get any worse!Please Note that the book is stored on your phone and you do NOT need a data connection to read it.This is a full-length, quality digitized book.Lisa the Unlikely Heroine, by Alan Clarke, is packaged with an easy to use functional book reader which means you can down load the App and start reading.This is a full length ebook version of this title.
